text:
@realDonaldTrump @louisdangelo3 TELL THEM MR. PRESIDENT!
THAT YOUR NOT PLAYING!

AND SUDDENLY COVID-19 IS NOT OF IMPORTANCE ANYMORE!
AMAZING! THE WHOLE LOCK DOWN WAS A SETUP TO BRING THE ECONOMY DOWN! AND THEN GEORGE FLOYD CAME ALONG! IT'S VERY SAD WHAT HAPPENED TO HIM BUT HE BURST THEIR PLAN IN TO FLAMES! WOW!
